normal.description: letter spacing normal. Geen extra ruimte tussen de letters.

2xs.description: Extra Extra Small font size, 2 extra Small (8px of 0.5rem)

xs.description: Extra Small font size, Extra Small (12px of 0.75rem)

md.description: Standaard grootte voor paragrafen. Medium font size, Medium (16px of 1rem)

xl.description: Extra Large font size, Extra Large (20px of 1.25rem)

2xl.description: Extra Extra Large font size, 2 Extra Large (22px of 1.375rem)

3xl.description: Extra Extra Extra Large font size, 3 Extra Large (24px of 1.5rem)

4xl.description: Extra Extra Extra Extra Large font size, 4 Extra Large (32px of 2rem)

sm.description: line height factor 1,22 / 125%, close to normal

md.description: line height factor 1,5 / 150%, Default paragraph line-height

35.description: basis link en knoppen CTA donkerblauw

60.description: licht blauw links en buttons in DrakMode

90.description: ijsblauw variant achtergrond, spotlight en uitgelicht

80.description: grijs variant voor achtergrond content is #CCCCCC niet #e5e5e5

scale.description: Makes the button 1.02 times bigger on hover and focus
